title: Kench's Devour
body: As we know, kench can also devour teammates. Today I played with a Kench, who kept devouring me and spitting me out under the enemy towers or during group fights spitting me out into the mid of enemy champions (I was mid as karthus and got killed within a second). Is it possible to let ally choose to get in or not? or maybe at least let the one who was devoured choose the time and direction of geting out!?

replies.body: you can choose when and where to get out genius, just click when he picks you up
thx but still sometimes just interrupt my farm... that guy I played with just sending advertisement of a website all the time.
Did he ult you to their nexus?

what did that add look like?

was it one of those elo boosting scrubs no one likes?
or an elo boosting scrub bot?
So on OCE you can actually get out? On EUW and EUNE you can't, it's kinda bugged :(
